title: MK Ultra LSD Experiments - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/14/18
itunes:title: MK Ultra LSD Experiments - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/14/18
description:
George Noory and filmmaker Paul Davids discuss his participation in a CIA sponsored experiment administering LSD to test subjects to explore the mental side effects, and the impact it had on his life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
